sent_1.text: STUDY DESIGN : Open , randomised clinical trial .

sent_2.text: SETTING : Academic hospitals in South Africa and Liverpool , UK .

sent_3.text: METHODS : Women undergoing induction of labour after 34 weeks of pregnancy were allocated by randomised , sealed opaque envelopes , to induction of labour with titrated oral misoprostol solution , or two doses of vaginal dinoprostone ( 2 mg ) administered six hours apart .

sent_4.text: Failure to deliver within 24 hours of randomisation was the primary outcome on which the sample size was based .

sent_5.text: The data were analysed by intention - to - treat .
